casebody.data:
BANK OF NEW HAVEN v. INTERSTATE INVESTMENT ASSOCIATES ET AL. (14583)

Lavery, Spear and Hennessy, Js.

Submitted on briefs November 6 decision released November 28, 1995 *928Lawrence A. Dubin filed a brief for the appellants (defendants). Kenneth J. Papa filed a brief for the appellee (plaintiff). PER CURIAM.

The judgment is affirmed and the case is remanded for the purpose of setting new law days.
